properties.description: Detects when object storage settings are updated in Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate configuration changes that require review.
properties.name: Object Storage Settings Updated
properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 28970
| extend Name =  extract("Name=\"(?<Name>[^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    ["User Name"] = user,
    ["Data SourceName"] = Name,
    MessageDetails = Description,
   Severity = SeverityDescription
